data.name: Dostyk/Druzba-Alashankou
data.description: Entry point for rail and road travel. By rail, count on 8 hours at the border. China and Soviet railroads use different gauges, and the wheels of the train need to be changed. This is also the location of the legendary Dzungarian gate (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dzungarian_Gate).

properties.description: Entry point for rail and road travel. By rail, count on 8 hours at the border. China and Soviet railroads use different gauges, and the wheels of the train need to be changed. This is also the location of the legendary Dzungarian gate (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dzungarian_Gate).
